content: this is my **beachcombing blanket** crochet along cal which was a 12 week crochet along which i hosted on my website between april june 2020 all the information about this blanket can still be found over on my website https //coastalcrochet com/2020/02/25/beachcombing-blanket-cal-introductions-and-planning/ the whole pattern is now available in a printer friendly pdf in my ravelry store each weekly instalment is ready for immediate download in both uk and us terms and in either a printer friendly text only copy or one with lots of photos it s all here for you enjoy
